Description: Painted linen depicting a mother and her two daughters adoring Hathor seated before an offering-table; long fringe at the right hand edge of the linen, shorter fringe along the top.
Curator's comments: Published G. Pinch, Votive offerings to Hathor (Oxford 1993), p.104, pl.16A.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
